testcase.name: Add employee
testcase.system-out: * def AddEmployee = read('classpath:src/test/resources/Payloads/addEmployee.json') . passed * def random_number = Math.floor(10000 + Math.random() * 90000) ........... passed * print 'Random Number:', random_number ................................... passed * set AddEmployee.email = random_number + "@gmail.com" .................... passed * set AddEmployee.id = random_number + "OW" ............................... passed * def login = call read('login.feature') .................................. passed * def token = login.accessToken ........................................... passed * print 'acces token from add employee '+token ............................ passed Given url baseUrl+addEmployeePathParameter ................................ passed And request AddEmployee ................................................... passed * print tenantId .......................................................... passed And headers {Content-Type: 'application/json', Connection: 'Keep-Alive' ,Tenantid:'bef53bd4-55fb-4ef0-93f9-553f644805ee'} . passed And header Authorization = 'bearer '+ token ............................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match $.message == 'success' .......................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed
